content.p: PG Director; External Advisory Board Coordinator; Associate Professor in Entrepreneurship and Management, Faculty of Social Sciences Michael Mustafa studied economics at the Australian National University, specializing in international and development economics, and received a Masters of Science in Management Psychology and a Phd in Applied Psychology at the University of Nottingham. His current research interests include HRD in family firms and employee entrepreneurialism in emerging economy firms. Mike also services as Editor of Entrepreneurship Research Journal and as an Associate Editor of Journal of Entrepreneurship in Emerging Economies Entrepreneurship and Creativity (MBA); Technology and Organizations (UG), Leadership, Engagement and Motivation (PG), Introduction to Applied Psychology (UG), People, Work and Organisations (UG) andâ€¦ read more Corporate Entrepreneurship, Family Firms, Entrepreneurial Behaviour, HRM/D, Psychological Ownership telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
